name: The Lost Warden
description:
The Lost Warden is a puzzle RPG that mixes thinking, tactics and dexterity.

The story takes place following a war of conquest of a continent by the Union, a unified empire. The main mechanics of the game is the permutation, which allows by dragging only one of his soldiers on the combat grid to move all his units.

Save your allies, thwart conspiracies, discover the mysteries of this world and live the epic adventure of Callum and his friends.

Gameplay

Each level places the player on a grid where the different characters and antagonists are arranged.
These possess their own statistics and special powers, allowing different actions.

At each turn, the player can only move one of his characters. He can, by a system of permutation, move the rest of his team during his turn. Each game turn is defined according to the speed of the character and the time bar decreases according to this one.

Once the characters are still, an attack phase will inflict damage on opponents. To inflict damage, you must create lines between the green points of each character, these lines must contain enemies. Once the attacks are resolved, the enemy will move its forces and inflict its own damage.

The game stops when all enemies are dead or only one character remains alive on our side.

Release

A desktop (windows+linux) demo with the tutorial and 11 levels is available right now! The full version of the game will be available for free Q4 2020 ! (No DLC, no in-game purchase, no Ad, no data collector !)
